dmca.title: ATTN: DMCA Agent (Copyright Infringement)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ian [mailto:ian@designbyian.com] 
Sent: Sunday, January 09, 2005 12:30 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: ATTN: DMCA Agent (Copyright Infringement)

Hello,

The following site, hosted on one of your servers, is running pirated
software:
searchsilver.com

The site is on the following server:
67.19.247.224

A few months ago you suspended/removed searchsilver.com for the same
copyright violation. The site is now back online running the same illegal
scripts.

To help verify the copyright, you will find my email address
(ian@designbyian.com) in the source code of the copied scripts (if it has
not been removed by the time you read this). Please do not share this
information with the website owner as it would facilitate future piracy.

The scripts will probably be located in the cgi-bin directory but could also
be located in root public_html or a sub directory of cgi-bin. The first
script to look for would be sf.cgi. Some of the pirated scripts will also
probably be located in an additional sub directory called /include.

Here is a partial list of scripts that, if found, are definitely pirated:
sf.cgi, clickstats.cgi, searchstats.cgi, proxyguard.cgi, earnings.cgi,
memclicks.cgi, cntryadmin.cgi, confirm.cgi, countrystats.cgi, xmltweak.cgi,
pglive.cgi, inactive.cgi, backup.cgi, feedme.cgi, menume.cgi, miscme.cgi.

It is also likely that the base search engine script powering this site is
an illegal copy of scripts owned by SmarterScripts.com. These scripts will
contain code modifications copyrighted by me. This is in addition to the
complete scripts mentioned above. Base scripts that probably contain pirated
code modifications:
smartsearch.cgi, include.cgi, accounts.cgi, crawl.cgi, admin_misc.cgi,
functions.cgi, search.cgi and a variety of others.

I affirm that I am the sole owner of the copyrighted material in question
and that all information contained herein is true and correct. I have
attached a digital scan of my signature.

I am requesting immediate removal. Please reply to confirm that the illegal
material is no longer online.

Let me know if you have questions.

Thank you,

Ian Kelley

______________________________________________________________________
Ian Kelley - Web Design and Programming
Ending world hunger through clever UI implementation.

Over ten years experience with HTML, web graphics, SEO and user interface
(UI) design. Over five years experience with PHP, Databases, DHTML, Flash,
Javascript, XML, CSS, and CGI (perl). Three years experience with Apache web
server running on Unix/Linux along with various server management software
packages.
